income_messages:
From: a***********a@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-07-27 21:37:01
SUBJECT:   Greeting to you,
  Greeting to you,
I know my email might come to you as a surprise couple with the fact
that we have never met before.
Well, I am Dr. Ajeeb Zakaria, an investment consultant. I wish to inform
you that I have a client who has good amount of money place under my
management for investment in any good environment that I could recommend.
So I will like to partner with you and achieve this
goal.
Upon receipt of your email and your interest to proceed, I shall give you
more insight on how we shall proceed towards conclusion.
I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
ajeebzakariaa@gmail.com
Best Regards,
Dr. Ajeeb Zakaria   
From: a***********a@gmail.com
To: qh75495@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-29 21:43:36
SUBJECT: Re: Greeting to you,
Dear Mr. David,,
Thank you for your email reply. Quiet considering the fact that I am not
acquainted with you and your company, but my plan is to initiate
correspondence with you first and attain a level of understanding and trust
with you considering my discussions with my client, which would enable us
to work in cooperation. I believe that the establishment of such trust and
understanding would be for the best interest for every one of us and I am
sure you agree with me.
I am an investment consultant, I offer professional investment advice and
analysis to clients, I also help clients determine where and how to invest
funds and take advantage of lucrative opportunities at the right time.
My client wishes to invest her financial portfolio worth $100,000,000.00
(One Hundred Million United States Dollars) in your Country or anywhere
overseas under your direct supervision. Your assistance is therefore needed
in receiving, investing and managing
the US$100,000,000.00.
So since I only specialize in consultation and advice services, I have
reasoned that it would be appropriate to get the participation of other
business professionals who would act as field managers of the investment
funds, whereas I would be acting as the consultant and adviser. You will be
paid 15% of the total amount for your service, and an additional 10% from
the returns on investment (ROI).
I will demand your 100% honesty, confidentiality and cooperation on this
matter as my client's position as a government official does not permit her
to own or operate an overseas account or company yet. So as soon as you
assure me that you can work with us then we can proceed towards conclusion
quickly.
I can assure you that this transaction will benefit us immensely as we
would reach a consensus on the number of years that you will manage the
(investment). Thank you as I look forward to hearing back from you.
Regards,
Dr. Ajeeb Zakaria
From: a***********a@gmail.com
To: qh75495@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-29 21:54:35
SUBJECT: Re: Greeting to you,
Dear Mr. David,
There is no risk like you think, What is required is your dedication, trust
and willingness in concluding this transaction with me.  I want us to
proceed immediately. We shall procure the legal documents that will
authenticate you as the investment manager of the funds, making you the
rightful beneficiary/ investment manager to the investment funds as stated
in the mail I sent to you.
Do get back to me so we can proceed quickly.
My regards
Dr Ajeeb Zakaria
outbound_messages:
From: qh75495@m**************p
To: a***********a@gmail.com
Time: 2022-07-27 21:37:03
SUBJECT: Re:   Greeting to you,
That sounds like a great chance for both of us. I would like to talk further about your plans.
Best,
David
From: qh75495@m**************p
To: a***********a@gmail.com
Time: 2022-07-29 21:45:09
SUBJECT: Re: Greeting to you,
I am happy to collaborate with you, but I want to know more about your plan and potential risks of course.
Best,
David
